title: "Machine learning is being used to improve Parkinson's disease outcomes"
excerpt: "A team of researchers at Oxford University is using a system of wearable sensors and machine-learning algorithms to track the progression of Parkinson's disease. It's a method designed to enable a more accurate monitoring of the progression of motor symptoms in a bid to improve diagnoses."
